title: AI Developer
summary: Highly motivated and results-oriented AI Developer with experience in designing, developing, and deploying AI models using TensorFlow and PyTorch. Proven ability to preprocess and analyze large datasets, build secure applications, and leverage NLP techniques for efficient data processing.  Seeking a challenging role to utilize my skills in machine learning and software development to contribute to innovative projects.

bullets: Designed and developed AI models using TensorFlow and PyTorch, achieving X% accuracy in [specific task or application]
Preprocessed and analyzed large datasets (size and type) using Python libraries (Pandas, NumPy) to prepare data for model training and evaluation
Developed a secure file encryption tool using AES-256 encryption with password hashing and .cyp file format
Implemented an Intrusion Detection System (IDS) to reduce unauthorized access attempts by 70%
items.name: CypherStack
items.summary: A secure file encryption tool with integrated Intrusion Detection System (IDS) and modular local/cloud storage.

bullets: Developed a role-based job portal with user roles (Admin, Employer, Applicant) and session tracking using Python and relevant frameworks
Developed an Applicant Tracking System (ATS) module to parse resumes and match skills with 80%+ accuracy using NLP techniques
items.name: HireArchy
items.summary: A role-based job portal with an integrated Applicant Tracking System (ATS) for employers
